references.reason: This paper is foundational for unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA), a core concept that CONTRAST builds upon.

references.paper_title: Tent: Fully test-time adaptation by entropy minimization
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel test-time adaptation method that CONTRAST adapts and extends to a multi-source setting.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised multi-source domain adaptation without access to source data
references.reason: This is a highly relevant prior work that CONTRAST builds upon, focusing on multi-source adaptation without source data access.

references.paper_title: Do we really need to access the source data? source hypothesis transfer for unsupervised domain adaptation
references.reason: This paper explores source-free domain adaptation, a critical aspect that CONTRAST directly addresses and improves upon.

references.paper_title: Generalization guarantees for neural architecture search with train-validation split
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical insights into generalization bounds which are relevant to the theoretical analysis provided by CONTRAST
